channel.title: Deleting Objects
channel.description: Hey guys, I was wondering, is there any other way to delete objects other than doing "c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(-1, ----, ----, 1, 10); //Deleted Object"? If there is please tell me.

item.title: Deleting Objects
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“Vain_, post:7, topic:520537”][quote author=sk8rdude461 link=topic=639034.msg4307834#msg4307834 date=1370218908]

Because everytime you relog in a spot where you deleted alot of objects it takes like 5 secs to go away

That means you have lag.

[/quote]it’s caused by any server with the objects removed server sided.

the client loads the region and displays the objects and then the server tries to remove them. this can be seen by removing an object, then logging out beside that object. when you log in, you will see it for a small amount of time before it vanishes.[/quote]
Well yes. There will always be server to client lag. That isn’t something you can get rid of. The time of the lag is based off your connection to the server.

Read full topic

item.title: Deleting Objects
item.dc:creator: @Vain1 Vain_
item.description:
@Vain1 wrote:

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:6, topic:520537”][quote author=tgm clan link=topic=639034.msg4307679#msg4307679 date=1370197250]
Because everytime you relog in a spot where you deleted alot of objects it takes like 5 secs to go away
[/quote]
That means you have lag.[/quote]it’s caused by any server with the objects removed server sided.

the client loads the region and displays the objects and then the server tries to remove them. this can be seen by removing an object, then logging out beside that object. when you log in, you will see it for a small amount of time before it vanishes.

Read full topic

item.title: Deleting Objects
item.dc:creator: @str0ngscap3 str0ngscap3
item.description:
@str0ngscap3 wrote:

go into client.java search for public void Deleteobjects()
under that add deletethatobject(Xcoord, ycoord); //object name

and done

Read full topic
